product_definition.product_description: A self-cleaning, insulated water bottle that uses UV-C light to purify water and neutralize bacteria every 2 hours.
product_definition.core_problem_solved: Reusable bottles getting smelly and moldy; need for clean water on the go.
product_definition.unique_selling_proposition: The only bottle that cleans itself and your water remotely via app integration.

target_audience.demographics: Millennials and Gen Z (ages 22-35), urban dwellers, working professionals.
target_audience.psychographics: Health-conscious, environmentally aware, tech-savvy, values convenience and aesthetics.
target_audience.cultural_nuances: High value on transparency and sustainability; tired of 'greenwashing'.

market_context.current_marketing_efforts: Instagram ads focusing on design; influencer partnerships.
market_context.known_customer_objections: Price is too high ($95); skepticism about UV technology effectiveness.

the_creative_goal.primary_objective: Increase brand awareness and drive pre-orders for the new 'Pro' model.
